message: Let's split fairly, considering the inflation
I understand the inflation puts you at a disadvantage, so I'm offering a bit more than half. This is a strong offer considering the circumstances.
Considering my loss due to inflation, this is the most I can compromise
Alice, this is my final offer. It's clear the longer this goes on, the less we both benefit. This offer gives you a larger share than you'd get if I accepted your previous offer after inflation.
